comment._content: This photo is probably from late March 1915, after Megantic rescued survivors from Denver, which itself had rescued survivors of Carib and Evelyn. I'm basing that on the adjacent negative numbers 3426-5 and 3426-7. www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/7267740838/in/p... news.google.com/newspapers?nid=2249&dat=19150401&...

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Captain of the Evelyn, sunk by German mines: Denver survivors, probably aboard Megantic:
